title: The Stepmother
overview:
Based on novel of the same name by Mariya Khalfina.
 In Pavel Olevantsevâ€™s family suddenly comes news that his daughter by another woman was orphaned. Pavel did not know about the existence of the girl, nor could his wife know about it... It is not easy to decide to take the child to his house. But it will be much more difficult to endear the girl to them, to return her the joy of childhood and the belief that she is not alone...
